ch.randelshofer.quaqua.leopard.filechooser

Class LeopardFileRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.leopard.filechooser.LeopardFileRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ListCellRenderer

    public class LeopardFileRenderer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.ListCellRenderer
    The FileRenderer is used to render a file in the JBrowser of one of the Quaqua FileChooserUI's.
    Version:
    $Id: LeopardFileRenderer.java 462 2014-03-22 09:23:12Z wrandelshofer $
    Author:
    Werner Randelshofer
    See Also:
